java.lang
Interface Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ThreadGroup
Enclosing interface:
Thread
public static interface Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

Interface for handlers invoked when a Thread abruptly terminates due to an uncaught exception.

Since:
1.5
See Also:
Thread.setDefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler(java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler), Thread.setUncaughtExceptionHandler(java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler)

Method Summary
 void uncaughtException(Thread t, java.lang.Throwable e)
          Method invoked when the given thread terminates due to the given uncaught exception.
 

Method Detail

uncaughtException

public void uncaughtException(Thread t,
                              java.lang.Throwable e)
Method invoked when the given thread terminates due to the given uncaught exception.

Parameters:
t - the thread
e - the exception
